```{r}
hg_marker_file <- read.delim("data/snp6.na35.remap.hg38.subset.txt.gz")
dim(hg_marker_file) ## 1837507       7
table(hg_marker_file$freqcnv)
Hg_marker_file <- hg_marker_file[hg_marker_file$freqcnv=="FALSE",]
head(Hg_marker_file)       
Hg_marker_file <- Hg_marker_file[,1:3]
names(Hg_marker_file) <- c("Marker Name","Chromosome","Marker Position")
head(Hg_marker_file)
write.table(Hg_marker_file,file = "data_output/Hg_marker.txt",sep = "\t",col.names = T,row.names = F)
```
